boardgame.name: DC Comics Dice Masters: Justice League
Injustice: Gods Among Us Dice Building Game
boardgame.description: Game description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The DC Comics Dice Masters: Justice League Starter Set, the fifth starter release for the Dice Masters game, has everything two players need to play and allows players to increase their Dice Masters collection or jump into the game fresh!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;DC Comics Dice Masters: Justice League features fan favorite characters from a variety of Justice Leagues, including Batman, Wonder Woman, Superman, Zatanna, and Martian Manhunter. With gameplay that supports two players in epic dice battles, DC Comics Dice Masters: Justice League lets players build their own version of the Justice League _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; or even the Legion of Doom!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Hand crafted dice bags. These bags have an inner layer and have dice as draw string ends. Please specify the style you would like: Marvel Heroes, Marvel Covers, Spider-Man, Batman, or DC Ladies. The bags are 4x6 inches flat. Shipping is $2. 3 for $25.

super rare constantine (full dice compliment) starter set + full gravity feed, so nearly a full set of dice, commons and uncommons, about half the rares. can supply a full list if needed. everything has been opened and in like new condition. as you know, the cards are slightly bent from being in the packs with dice. Will ship in a sweet zen bins storage tray and deck box for the extra cards/dice. $10 shipping to US, please inquire for international.
